All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BlackjackGameSimulator
class that contains the main function - drives the interaction between the user and the blackjack game
BlackjackLogic
abstract class to house logic functions for the game of blackjack.
Card
the Card class represents a single card from a standard 52 card deck
Dealer
 
DealingMachine
Public class to represent a shuffled version of a deck of cards that works like a stack
Deck
Public class to represent the deck used for the game
GameActor
Abstract class that captures shared functionality between the Player and the Computer (each considered a "GameActor")
Player
Class to represent the player that extends the abstract class GameActor
Visualizer
Interface the ensure that all game objects use the same function handle to update the visuals of the game
